description:
Want to learn Apple's new powerful programming language?

If YES this course is for YOU!

Swift. A new language that lets everyone build amazing apps.

Swift is a powerful and intuitive new programming language created by Apple for building iOS and Mac apps. It’s designed to give advanced developers the freedom and capabilities they need to create a new generation of cutting-edge apps. It also opens up a whole new world of possibilities for everyone else. Swift is easy to learn and use — even if you’ve never coded before. So now anyone with an idea can create something incredible.

Better performance equals better apps.

Swift apps more than live up to the name. For instance, a common search algorithm completes much faster using Swift.

up to 2.6x faster than objective-C

up to 8.4x fatser than Python 2.7

What's the course about and how is it structured?

In this course we will learn Swift with a step by step approach using Xcode 6.

The course covers :

Variable types

Variable type conversions

Statements

Strings

Arrays

Dictionaries

Functions

Classes

Materials

The course consists of :

1- hour video lectures with code from scratch

This course can be completed in a couple of hours.

Why to follow this course?

If you want to learn Apple's new powerful programming language this course is for you!

Who can follow this course ?

Anyone with basic knowledge of programming can follow this course.

title: Learn Swift Language
